profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.6 Rendering intents
profile.description: Where a rendering intent is specified, its value shall be one of the four values defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, Table 70: RelativeColorimetric, AbsoluteColorimetric, Perceptual or Saturation.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
